item.title: Jenkins
item.description: Jenkinsfile A Jenkinsfile is a text file that contains the definition of a Jenkins Pipeline and is checked into source control. Sample Jenkinsfile for Angular application. Taken from here pipeline{ agent { label 'nodejs8' } stages{ stage ('checkout'){ steps{ checkout scm } } stage ('install modules'){ steps{ sh ''' npm install --verbose -d npm install --save classlist.js ''' } } stage ('test'){ steps{ sh ''' $(npm bin)/ng test --single-run --browsers Chrome_no_sandbox ''' } post { always { junit "test-results.
